name: ジョーカーII
summary:
"Joker II" continues the story that started in "Joker".
Six months have passed. Wild is taken care by his friends and companions. The same nightmare pursues him: he sees his sweetheart Laura calling for him, begging him to save her... Wild has to rebuild his life from scratch, but this nightmare ties him to his past... so he ventures out to look for answers once again.
info:
• 原画: 林家志弦
